Verses: 1 karththaave, Neere En Dhevan; Ummai Uyarththi, Umadhu Naamaththaith Thudhippen; Neer Adhisayamaanavaigalai Seydheer; Umadhu Aalosanaigal Saththiyamum Urudhiyumaanavaigal.
2 neer Nagaraththai Manmedum, Aranaana Pattanaththaip Paazhumaakkineer; Anniyarin Raajadhaaniyai Ooraayiraadhapadikkum, Endraikkum Kattappadaadhapadikkum Seydheer.
3 aagaiyaal Balaththa Janangal Ummai Magimaippaduththuvaargal; Kodooramaana Jaadhigalin Nagaram Umakku Bayappadum.

4 kodooramaanavargalin Seeral Madhilai Modhiyadikkira Peru Vellaththaippol Irukkaiyil, Neer Ezhaikku Belanum, Nerukkappadugira Eliyavanukkuth Thidanum Peruvellaththukkuth Thappum Adaikkalamum, Veyilukku Odhungum Nizhalumaaneer.
5 varatchiyaana Idaththin Kaangai Megaththinaal Thanivadhupola, Anniyarin Mummuraththaith Thaniyappannuveer; Megaththin Nizhalinaal Veyilthanigiradhupol Belavandharin Aaravaaram Thaniyum.

6 senaigalin Karththar Indha Malaiyile Sagala Janangalukkum Oru Virundhai Aayaththappaduththuvaar; Adhu Kozhumaiyaana Padhaarththangalum, Pazhamaiyaana Dhraatcharasamum, Oonum Ninamumulla Padhaarththangalum, Thelindha Pazhamaiyaana Dhraatcharasamum Niraindha Virundhaayirukkum.
7 sagala Janangalmelumulla Mukkaattaiyum, Sagala Jaadhigalaiyum Moodiyirukkira Moodalaiyum, Indha Malaiyile Agatrippoduvaar.

8 avar Maranaththai Jeyamaai Vizhunguvaar; Karththaraagiya Dhevan Ellaa Mugangalilumirundhu Kanneeraith Thudaiththu, Thamadhu Janaththin Nindhaiyai Boomiyiliraadhapadikku Mutrilum Neekkividuvaar; Karththare Idhai Sonnaar.

9 akkaalaththile: Idho, Ivare Nammudaiya Dhevan; Ivarukkaagak Kaaththirundhom, Ivar Nammai Ratchippaar; Ivare Karththar, Ivarukkaagak Kaaththirundhom; Ivarudaiya Ratchippinaal Kalikoorndhu Magizhuvom Endru Sollappadum.
10 karththarudaiya Karam Indha Malaiyile Thangum; Koolam Erukkalaththil Midhikkappaduvadhupola, Movaab Avarkeezh Midhikkappattuppom.

11 neendhugiravan Neendhuvadharkaagath Than Kaigalai Virippadhupola, Avar Thamadhu Kaigalai Avargal Naduvile Viriththu, Avargal Perumaiyaiyum, Avargal Kaigalin Sadhisarppanaigalaiyum Thaazhththividuvaar.
12 avar Un Madhilgaludaiya Uyarndha Aranaik Keezhe Thallith Thaazhththith Tharaiyile Thoolaaga Azhippaar.
